evidence.text: the Agreement's terms are hereby incorporated into this Order as if fully set forth herein

evidence.source_document: Order Approving and Entering Consent Decree
evidence.text: The Court retains complete jurisdiction of this matter to enforce this Order and the terms of the incorporated Agreement until the Defendants have fulfilled their obligations therein

extracted.value: Court retains complete jurisdiction to enforce this Order and the terms of the incorporated Agreement until the Defendants have fulfilled their obligations therein

evidence.text: ORDERED that James Conrad Welch is appointed the Monitor, pursuant to Paragraphs 129-30 of the Agreement.

extracted.value: James Conrad Welch is appointed the Monitor, pursuant to Paragraphs 129-30 of the Agreement.

evidence.text: ORDER- Upon consideration of the Joint Motion to Dismiss 75, it is hereby ORDERED that this action is dismissed with prejudice.
